headline: VARIAN COMBINATION VACUUM GAUGE CONTROLLER
description: Ion gauge,Dual thermocouple gauges    Varian Sentorr BA2
specstable:
Manufacturer Varian
Model Sentorr BA2
Description Ion gauge with resistive degas, Dual thermocouple gauges
Gauge Types Controlled Ion, Dual thermocouple

Other Information
